phrs.translation: 守法主义者, 法律学家, 形式主义者, 条文主义者英语

sentences.sentence: They consulted some legalist regarding the case.
sentences.translation: 为了这个案子，他们请教了某个法律学家。

sentences.sentence: Hanfei was the master of legalist school at the end of the Warring Period.
sentences.translation: 韩非，战国末期法家思想的集大成者。

sentences.sentence: They came from the "legalist notes", being a product of the popular meta - culture.
sentences.translation: 公案小说来源于法家类“珥笔书”，是晚明文化普及浪潮的产物。
